articles.description: Virender Sehwag was very critical of Kane Williamson's batting approach in the season.
articles.content: Kane Williamson has had a torrid time with the bat in IPL 2022. He has scored just 208 runs at a sluggish average of 18.91 with just one fifty-plus score. In their last match against KKR, Williamson … [+1891 chars]
